# ACAccountType

**Class**

An object that encapsulates information about all accounts of a particular type.

## Declaration

```swift
class ACAccountType
```

## Overview

You don’t create account type objects directly. To obtain an account type object, use the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccountStore/accountType(withAccountTypeIdentifier:)] method or the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccount/accountType] property of an account object. Use the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccountStore/accounts(with:)] method to obtain all accounts of a particular type.

## Accessing Properties

- **accessGranted**: A Boolean value indicating whether the user granted the application access to accounts of this type.
- **accountTypeDescription**: A human-readable description of the account type.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the account type.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
